properties.name: camel.component.vertx-http.allow-java-serialized-object
properties.description: Whether to allow java serialization when a request has the Content-Type application/x-java-serialized-object This is disabled by default. If you enable this, be aware that Java will deserialize the incoming data from the request. This can be a potential security risk.

properties.name: camel.component.vertx-http.autowired-enabled
properties.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

properties.name: camel.component.vertx-http.basic-auth-password
properties.description: The password to use for basic authentication

properties.name: camel.component.vertx-http.basic-auth-username
properties.description: The user name to use for basic authentication

properties.name: camel.component.vertx-http.bearer-token
properties.description: The bearer token to use for bearer token authentication

properties.name: camel.component.vertx-http.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the vertx-http component. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.component.vertx-http.header-filter-strategy
properties.description: To use a custom org.apache.camel.spi.HeaderFilterStrategy to filter header to and from Camel message. The option is a org.apache.camel.spi.HeaderFilterStrategy type.

properties.name: camel.component.vertx-http.lazy-start-producer
properties.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

properties.name: camel.component.vertx-http.proxy-password
properties.description: The proxy server password if authentication is required

properties.name: camel.component.vertx-http.proxy-username
properties.description: The proxy server username if authentication is required

properties.name: camel.component.vertx-http.response-payload-as-byte-array
properties.description: Whether the response body should be byte or as io.vertx.core.buffer.Buffer

properties.name: camel.component.vertx-http.ssl-context-parameters
properties.description: To configure security using SSLContextParameters. The option is a org.apache.camel.support.jsse.SSLContextParameters type.

properties.name: camel.component.vertx-http.use-global-ssl-context-parameters
properties.description: Enable usage of global SSL context parameters

properties.name: camel.component.vertx-http.vertx
properties.description: To use an existing vertx instead of creating a new instance. The option is a io.vertx.core.Vertx type.

properties.name: camel.component.vertx-http.vertx-http-binding
properties.description: A custom VertxHttpBinding which can control how to bind between Vert.x and Camel. The option is a org.apache.camel.component.vertx.http.VertxHttpBinding type.

properties.name: camel.component.vertx-http.vertx-options
properties.description: To provide a custom set of vertx options for configuring vertx. The option is a io.vertx.core.VertxOptions type.
